title: when are we getting our ranked borders for s8?
body: just thought the season ended 3 days ago and have got nothing yet? when we getting them

replies.body:
We don't. They've removed End of Season Ranked borders.

Instead, they're having "live" borders, so during Season 9 our border will show our *current* rank, and not our previous one. The only place Season 8's rank shows up is in the Lobby where your banner will have a different outline based on how you ranked this season, which basically means no one but someone you're queuing with will see, and even then there will be a massive icon on each lobby banner showing the current rank (will will draw attention away from the banner outline).
